body.p: By default, titles are rendered on a single line (with both chapter/section number and title text). If the title is too long, the text wraps to the next line without any indentation.

p.codeblock: 4.5.5 This is a long title text that wraps.

body.p: If you want each line of the title to start at the same location (and so being indented), you need to set the value of the args.css.param.title.layout transformation parameter to table. This way, chapter/section number is placed in one cell and title text is placed in another cell (resulting and indented text):
body.codeblock: 4.5.5 This is a long title text that wraps.
